title: Ancient well hidden for centuries in cathedral crypt uncovered in new art project
description: St Mungo's Well - believed to be the site of baptisms performed by the city's patron saint - has been transformed into a modern light display.

title: Becoming human in southern Africa: What ancient hunter-gatherer genomes reveal - Down To Earth
description: Becoming human in southern Africa: What ancient hunter-gatherer genomes reveal Down To EarthView Full coverage on Google News

title: Becoming human in southern Africa: What ancient hunter-gatherer genomes reveal
description: New genetic research on ancient southern African hunter-gatherers reveals unique biological adaptations, offering insights into human evolution and migration. The study highlights the genetic stability of these populations over 9,000 years.

title: Lake District hotel introduces ancient Chinese practice this winter'
description: A hotel in the Lake District is helping guests find balance and calm through an ancient practice.

title: Human evolution mystery unlocked: How 100,000 years of isolation in southern Africa revealed hidden secrets of ancient DNA and our evolutionary history
description: New research reveals ancient humans in southern Africa lived in isolation for nearly 100,000 years. This led to unique genetic traits not seen in modern populations. These findings show human evolution was complex, involving multiple isolated groups. The study analyzed genomes from 28 ancient individuals, offering insights into early human diversity and adaptation.
